item.description:
Don't forget your photo!!!
Time to have some creative fun....Bring your best snap shot of your pooch and see if you will be Boston's MOST FABULOUS MEETUP PUP!!!


All you have to do to participate is stop in to doggie day play center between now and April 15th and pick up an application and submit (1) photo of your MOST FABULOUS pup! Feel free to be creative, but please make it a shot where we can clearly see your dog at its best!

Each pup that wins ?Most Fabulous? in their meet-up group will then move on to the ?DoggieDay Meet-up Pup? finals. The pup to win the title of ?DoggieDay Meet-up Pup? will receive a complimentary birthday party for them and 9 of their closest puppy friends. The birthday will be held during the week of their birthday on a date chosen by the dog?s guardian. DoggieDay will send out the invites, track the RSVP?s, set your pup up on ?sPoochies Gift Registry, provide the puppy cake, goodie bags for the four-legged attendees, the decorations and all you have to do is show up for the soire.

Feel free to check out our Chihuahua meet up site for more information or stop by Doggie Day to pick up the application keep in mind that deadline is April 15th!
Good luck!!!

Locations:

1. Doggie Day -- 400 Tremont Street in Boston
2. Paws for a Cause -- 1386 Beacon Street in Brookline (Coolidge Corner)
item.name: The Boston Chihuahua April Meetup
